Here's a photo of Jonny answering his questions...
That's Chris's turn done. He says thanks for all your questions folks. We'll have to do this again.
Chris says: "I like falconry, jousting and looking for suits of armour on eBay. And making up daft answers to questions."
hi chris, what do you like to do in your spare time?
Chris says: "Sherlock Holmes Stories. The Old Man In The Sea by Ernest Hemingway. And Birdsong by Sebastian Faulks."
Chris says: "Rita Ora."
Who is your favorite new artist right now in music?
Chris says: "The Sahara. Oh, wait a minute..."
Hi Chris! What is your favorite dessert?
Chris says: "My favourite Beatles song is Blackbird. Or I Am The Walrus. Or Something."
What is your favorite song of the beatles?
Chris says: "I'd like to be able to fly."
If you could have one superpower, what would it be?
Chris says: "I've never actually owned a car."
Chris what was your first car?
Chris says: "Turquoise"
HI Chris ! ;) what is your favorite colour ? :D
Chris says: "Paranoid Android by Radiohead. That's why we never do it."
Hi chris, What is the most difficult song to play?
Chris says: "Sherlock Holmes. Some people say he wasn't real, but I know that's not true. Him or Dumbledore."
If you could have diner with a dead celebrity, who would that be?
Chris says: "My favourite comic is Woody Allen. And Simon Pegg."
What are your favorite comic?
Chris says: "When the wristbands light up, I feel this is one of the greatest things I've ever seen, and I feel extremely grateful"
Chris, what do you feel when the wristbands start glowing in the dark?
Chris says: "I'm not sure, but I think the song Shine Ya Light by Rita Ora is really great. She's playing it right now, here in Turin"
What Coldplay's song you consider the best ?
Chris says: "The answer is too rude. Next question..."
Hey Chris!! What's your favorite place in the world?
Chris says: "Any venue with fans in it. I don't mind. That might sound cheesy, but it's true."
What's your favourite venue to play a gig?
Chris says: "I love Scrabble. And backgammon."
what's your favourite classic board game?
Chris says: "I'm not quite sure I have! But I can use all ten fingers now."
when did first learn how to play piano ?
Chris says: "I enjoyed the Paradise video shoot. And the Yellow one."
What song did you most enjoy doing a video for?
Chris says: "My favourite movies are Back To The Future, Annie Hall and Life Is Beautiful"
Hi Chris! What is your favourite movie? :)
Chris says: "Really the audience decides what to cut, because we respond to what the fans like best. But Phil is in charge of setlists"
Chris says: "I get nervous before breakfast. I'm English!"
Do you still get nervous before you perform?
Chris says: "Gratitude. And as Bruce Springsteen said it could be someone's 1st concert or it could be someone's last concert"
What keeps you motivated for every show you do?
Chris says: "I used to, but now I don't. I love it"
do you find it awkward to make eye contact with fans whilst on stage? I know I would
Chris says: "Hello, by the way. Feel free to ask me anything!"
Chris says: "At the moment, it's a tie between Paradise and Every Teardrop."
Mr. Martin, what's your absolute favorite song to play live?
Chris is here for his q&a...
And that's Jonny done. Next up, in a few minutes, it's Mr Chris Martin. Get your questions in to
Jonny says: "Ooh, beautiful isn't a word often used to describe cities. I would say maybe Buenos Aires"
What is the most beautiful city you know?
Jonny says: "Good question! Not at all, to be honest. Haha!"
Hi Jonny. How have mathematics and astronomy helped you in your musical career?
Jonny says: "Don't stop when you get blisters"
hi Jonny, any advice to people who start to learn playing a guitar?
Jonny says: "No, I'm not a great cook. I can do a half decent chicken one pot thing, though."
Are you good at cooking? What's you speciality?
Jonny says: "It was Mission Impossible IV on a plane. Simon Pegg was ace."
Jonny, the last movie you saw?
Haha! We've just noticed that "Hi Jonny" is trending worldwide. Jonny says: "Hello back!" :-)
Jonny says: "No. Because the goals you set yourself keep changing."
Jonny: do you think you have accomplished all your goals as an artist?
Jonny says: "I used to be afraid of heights, but I don't seem to be any more. I was on a rollercoaster when I realised this!"
hi jonny do you have any phobias?
Jonny says: "I don't think I decided, other people seemed to decide for me! Only my mother calls me Jonathan."
When did you decide that you prefer 'Jonny' over 'Jonathan'?
Jonny says: "Yes, we know roughly when we want to start making the next record"
Jonny says: "No"
can you touch your nose with your tongue?
Jonny says: "I think it tends to vary by continent, more than country. I feel like Lost goes down best in N. America."
Hey Jonny! Do you feel certain countries like certain songs better? What do you make of it?
Jonny says: "I'd been playing for eight or nine years before the band. Since I was 11"
hi jonny, how long had you been playing guitar before you joined the band?
Jonny says: "If I'm nervous, I find playing the guitar a lot helps."
what's the best way to calm your nerves before a show?
Jonny says: "My favourite pedal is The Rat, because it's the loudest pedal around"
Jonny - What's your favorite guitar pedal ever?
Jonny says: "I feel happy to be in Italy"
Hi Jonny :) how are you?
Jonny says: "I play the drums, very badly. And the bass even worse."
Jonny says: "My favourite is the Fender Telecaster Thinline."
Jonny, what's your favorite type of guitar?
Jonny says: "I'd say visit Chatsworth House. I have some happy childhood memories of playing in the gardens there."
jonnyboy! What's the best place in England to visit?
Here's Jonny!

Right, that's Will done - and our first ever session is now over. Thanks very much for all your questions.
Will says: "My history teacher, Mrs Petherham. For not giving me too much of a hard time when I bunked off to go to Glastonbury!"
when you were a student in elementary school, who's your favorite teacher?
Will says: "It's my daughter's hand print"
what your tattoo means?
Will says: "I'd be a brogue"
Will says: "It would have to be choco liebnitz. It's like a rich tea but with half an inch of solid chocolate on top"
your favourite biscuit with a cup of tea? : )
Will says: "Bill Bailey."
favourite comedian? :D
Will says: "To use a football analogy, it's played 10 seasons in a row and it needs a rest"
Will says: "Yes. I like Rudolf Schindler. He built the first truly modern house in LA in the 1920s"
favourite architect?!
Will says: "We've had the pleasure of playing with the Arcade Fire at some festivals, who are awesome"
best band you've toured with?
Will says: "I've got a few, but anything by Canaletto and I love Ben Nicholson"
favourite painting? :)
Will says: "It's got to be the Paradise video, which we recorded on a cheetah sanctuary in South Africa"
favorite location you made a song/vedio at? which song?
Will says: "Richard Strauss. He has a famous piece of music called The Four Last Songs, which was my grandfather's favourite"
Favourite classical composer? ;)
Will says: "Tell Me A Tale" by Michael Kiwanuka
Your favourite song at the moment?
Will says: "Ooh, good question. Risotto." Jonny says: "What do you put in it?" Will says: "All manner of things"
what's your favorite food that you love to cook?
Will says: "Probably the Pogues at the moment"
favourite band?
Will says: "I think either Holland or Spain. But you can never rule out the Germans."
Will says: "Getting to travel the world and play music with my best friends"
Best thing about being in the band? :)
Will says: "Wolverine."
Favourite superhero?
Will says: "Cooking. Drinking coffee. And reading."
will, what are your hobbies!
Will says: "Yes. Violin, piano, guitar, bass. Tin whistle. Banjo. This is all true."
Will, did you try out any other instruments before you found the drums?
Will says: "Steak tartare"
Whats your favourite French dish ? Good luck for tonight !
Will says: "Hazelnut. Particularly in Italy, where I believe it's called nociola"
favorite flavor of icecream?
Will says: "Yes, I did watch it. And I did think they were going to win, just because of the difficult season they'd had."
Hello Will, how are you? did you watched the CL final? did you thought that Chelsea would win?
Will says: "Orion, because he's an archer and the star which represents his elbow is betelgeuse which glows orange in the sky"
favourite constellation?
Will says: "Tuscany"
Will says: "Adam Lallana. He's going to light up the Premier League next season."
Who is your favourite Southampton player?
Will says: "There's a song called Famous Old Painters which is great but never saw the light of day"
have you made a song the you really like but it never came out? if you do... do you remember the name?
Will says: "We always play on the same side. We won 1-0 at the Reebok Stadium"
who won the game of ps3 football? You or jonny?

/con... "the stage and have a bit of a group moment where we come together and have a bit of a team talk. And then we're on"
Guys says: "Will, Jonny and I do some vocal warm-up exercises, then get our stage clothes and monitors on. And then we walk to the side of..
What do you do to prepare before a gig?
Guys says: "Some place sunny and tropical. Maybe the Maldives. It wouldn't be very practical, though. So I don't."
Guy, if you could live anywhere in the world, where would you live?
Guy says: "I don't have pets as such, but I have 6 chickens, 4 miniature cows and some tadpoles which are taking ages to sprout legs"
Guy says: "My favourite movie of all time is Stanley Kubrick's 2001"
what's your favorite movie?
Guy says: "Moby Dick"
what is your favourite book?
Guy says: "Raspberry"
favourite type of jam?
Guy says: "I've collected a lot of pictures, which I love. But I haven't got round to formalising them into anything. Yet."
What happened with your Old Photo Project? I'm curious about that too!
Guy says: "The Beatles"
Guy, what's your favourite band?
Guy says: "I like engineering. The restoration of interesting automobiles."
Guys says: "Green juice, a mix of apples, cucumber, celery, spinach, kale and ginger. Although I can rarely be bothered to make it!"
hello fellas. That one super food that can get the creative juices flowing? Alfalfa sprouts? blueberries? papaya? BEETS!!??
Guy says (after much thought): "I love most 1930s French cars. Bugatti, Delahay, Talbot Lago & Jaguar E-type"
Guy says: "Glastonbury is always very special, but these stadium shows we've done over the last week have been very exciting and special"
favourite ever show or venue?
Guy says: "Barn finds. Old, pre-1965 cars that are lurking in barns. If anyone knows of one pls email a picture to anchorman@coldplay.com"
Guy, what is your latest obsession? Renovating old buses? Learning to fly? Still antiquing?
Guy says: "My laptop, my running shoes, several books and sometimes some car parts to work on"
Is there anything you always take on tour (besides your wallet and pictures from families)?
Guy says: "It's got to be salt and vinegar, really"
whats your favourite flavour of crisp?
Guy says: "I like Hold On by Alabama Shakes"
Favoruite song at the moment?
Guy says: "For just about 20 years"
hey Guy, how long have you been playing the bass?
Guys says: "they're both great for a certain period of time but after a while you crave the other"
Do you prefer touring or recording?
Guy says: "Ooh, depends on the time of day. If it's morning it's coffee. But anything after lunch is tea."
in Singapore! Guy, coffee or tea?
/cont "...thing to put your body through, so anyone thinking of doing it must be prepared to suffer. Might do a half, though."
Guy says: "I don't think so. To do it once sort of satisfied the sense of achievement that I wanted to have. But it's a really hard...
Hey Guy! Any plans to run the London Marathon again?
Guy says: "The look was supposed to be like space mechanics"
hey Guy I allways wondering about the wardrobe for MX. What was the inspiration for the design?

What are your thoughts on Party Ring Biscuits?
